title: So This Happened
body: So basically I was playing some ranked games with my friends and I was alt tabbed about changing music, but then it wouldn't let me go back into the loading screen. This happened 2 times and now I have a leavebuster. GG rito{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} Help me.

replies.body:
*Alt+tabbing* can sometimes cause a lot of issues depending on your PC's specific setup and certain conditions. Generally, it's not a good idea to *Alt+Tab* until after you see the champion portraits show up on the loading screen. Doing so before that can prevent League from interacting properly with your Graphics Card and Driver. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok its fixed but my game starts up very slower now.
Starts up as in 'after clicking the League Icon' or 'after champ select'?

Gotcha. Frequently, slow load times are caused by missing system permissions for League, which cause certain requests for data to take longer than they should. I suggest following the steps from our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see if it changes your load times.
I found out the reason was because I installed plays.tv and it wouldn't let me go back into league so I'm ok now.
